name: Watchog
description: The Lookout Pokémon. They make the patterns on their bodies shine in order to threaten predators. Keen eyesight lets them see in the dark.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: This Pokémon knows the Light cantrip and can cast it at will.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.description: After this Pokémon misses an attack, its next attack is done at advantage.
